p: Despite a body of evidence reporting the entomological impact of ITCs on Ae. aegypti, little is known about their epidemiological impact on dengue or other arboviral infections. Although preliminary evidence suggested that ITCs could impact Ae. aegypti populations at a level that could reduce DENV transmission [ 11, 16], the epidemiological effect has not been rigorously evaluated. To address this gap, we carried out a cluster-randomized controlled trial of ITCs in Iquitos, Peru.
